title: Elevator Access, Community Playground, New Vinyl Windows
posting_body: 1 Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit 2 Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit
When you choose to live at Vega, you are choosing affordable apartments in Northglenn, CO that never cut corners.
Each one of our homes features a line of excellent amenities and community perks that make Vega something truly exceptional.

Residents in search of apartments in Thornton, CO for rent should take note of all our apartment and community features, from plush-carpeted floors and in-unit A/C to on-site laundry, ceiling fans, and oversized closet spaces.
Additional community features include a two-season pool, mobile-friendly elevator, cable and high-speed internet ready apartments, and even a common BBQ/grill area.
Our apartments are also located on a major bus line for those who enjoy public transportation options, while downtown Denver is only a few minutes’ drive away.
All this and more makes our apartments for rent in Thornton, CO a truly special place to call home.
Contact us today to schedule your tour!
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 910 Sq.
- Cable Ready & Wired for High-Speed Internet
- Community BBQ Area with Gas Grills
- Fantastic Location Just Minutes from Two Major Bus Lines
- Pet-Friendly Community with Two Dog Parks
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
